1395720.name: Spiritfarer®: Farewell Edition - OST
1395720.description:
Original soundtrack composed for Spiritfarer that highlights all the memorable moments of the game. An emotionally moving and heartwarming orchestral score that accompanies Stella along her journey, as she cares for her spirit friends before guiding them to the afterlife.

The Spiritfarer: Farewell Edition Soundtrack now includes music from the heartwarming base game and its three major content updates, as well as a bonus "Ambient Mix"!

Music & Lyrics by Max LL

Vocals in What Will You Leave Behind (End Title)
Performed by Maude Plante-Husaruk

Vocals in What Will You Leave Behind (Reprise)
Performed by Timbre Cierpke

Additional performances by
Maude Plante-Husaruk (Vocals), Maria Grigoryeva (Violin) & Leo Bercoff (Harmonica)

Artwork by Jo Gauthier

Mastering by Harris Newman

Total duration: 1 hour and 17 minutes
